device.label: Tank
device.description:
Fluid Dia tank element which represents a physical one. Needs a tank sensor as part of the element and 2 Dia channels to control the input and output valves. The tank sensor device MUST generate the following 2 Dia channels:
\t- temperature: Displays the temperature of the tank (C). \t- distance: Displays the distance in inches from the top of the tank to the liquid.

setting.label: Tank Sensor device
setting.tooltip: Must be set to the name of a tank sensor instance.

setting.label: Input Valve channel
setting.tooltip: Name of the Dia channel to be interpreted as Input Valve status.

setting.label: Output Valve channel
setting.tooltip: Name of the Dia channel to be interpreted as Output Valve status.

setting.label: High Level Alarm
setting.tooltip: Insert the minimum value of the tank level (%) to trigger a high level alarm. Leave it in blank to disable the high level alarm.

setting.label: Low Level Alarm
setting.tooltip: Insert the maximum value of the tank level (%) to trigger a low level alarm. Leave it in blank to disable the low level alarm.

setting.label: High Temperature Alarm
setting.tooltip: Insert the minimum value of the temperature (C) to trigger a high temperature alarm. Leave it in blank to disable the high temperature alarm.

setting.label: Low Temperature Alarm
setting.tooltip: Insert the maximum value of the temperature (C) to trigger a low temperature alarm. Leave it in blank to disable the low temperature alarm.
